original_title: Dead Sea Scrolls: The Doomsday Prophecy
overview: Hidden for nearly 2000 years in remote caves along the shores of the Dead Sea, this two hour special will uncover the dark secrets of the Dead Sea Scrolls to solve these and other mysteries and reveal the grim fate of the Keeper of the Scrolls.
title: Dead Sea Scrolls: The Doomsday Prophecy
